title: Popload Festival
descricao: Welcome to paint pARTy Cardiff! Blending artistic and alcoholic spirits at Cardiff's most creative night out! Come and join us for a fun-fuelled evening of painting in a super relaxed and friendly environment, where one of our talented artists will take you on a step-by-step journey to transform a blank canvas into your very own acrylic masterpiece. We promise, absolutely NO artistic experience is required. Our paint pARTies really are for everyone and we guarantee, you'll be amazed at what you can achieve! With a different painting each month, every paint pARTy is truly unique so take a peek through our upcoming events, book onto the one you fancy and we'll be seeing you there! Let's drink, paint and be happy :) #makingmemories #paintpartycardiff
